# Welcome to Modern Biology {.unnumbered}

<div class="hero-section">
<div class="hero-text">
<h2>Understanding Life Through Universal Principles</h2>
<p>This textbook presents biology as a coherent system governed by fundamental principles of <strong>energy transformation</strong> and <strong>information processing</strong>, rather than as a collection of facts.</p>
</div>
</div>

## How to Use This Book

### For Students
- Start with Chapter 1 to build foundational concepts
- Use the learning objectives to guide your study
- Complete the embedded questions and exercises
- Explore the interactive visualizations when available [TODO]

### For Instructors
- Use chapters in sequence or select relevant sections
- Assign problem sets from the appendices
- Incorporate the interactive elements into lectures
- Use the comprehensive references for further reading

### Interactive Features [TODO]
- **Animated diagrams** explaining complex processes
- **Self-assessment quizzes** at the end of each chapter
- **Data exploration activities** with real biological data
- **Intuitive thinking exercises**
